website_summaries.verdict: Offers ample heating ability for a reasonable price. It's worth considering in spite of a few concerns.
pros: Easy to assemble and effective at heating most patio areas with its 48,000 BTUs
Ample power for a mid-level price
cons: The ignition occasionally takes several attempts to light
The bottom has little weight, which makes it easy to tip over

customer_reviews.title: The tank housing does not stay up on its own.
customer_reviews.text: The housing for propane tank does not stay up on its own. There isn't any extra part to keep it up. They do not have another housing unit available for this heater. It's a 2-person job just to change the propane cylinder. Very inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN LOGUE

customer_reviews.title: so good. I've had a number of outdoor heaters and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I've had a number of outdoor heaters and dreaded putting a new one together but this was the easiest assembly of all time. Very easy, in fact. It's a matter of attaching the wheels, attaching the frame that goes around the tank, connecting the tubes, screwing in the completely installed head unit, and then the reflecting disc on top. 45 minutes tops and I could do another right now in half the time. Best yet it lit up instantly and throws off a lot more heat than any of my other heaters. The stainless steel is good quality and looks great. Very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: G. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Puts out good heat. Difficult to change propane because the piece that covers the tank does not have a door. You have to lift the whole piece and hold it in place with one hand while you replace the tank with the other hand. Full tanks are heavier than I can easily manage with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Working now
customer_reviews.text: We spent about 7 hours trying to get this to work, including having a contractor and HVAC specialist look at it. No one could figure out or fix the problem, so we must have received a defective part(s). I have requested replacement parts from the seller and will update my review according to whether I receive working parts and how the unit works once I have those parts. Update... received replacement parts and it is up and running. So far so good. My advice to future buyers is if you can’t get this working within a reasonable period of time get a replacement part and don’t waste six hours trying to figure out what you’re doing wrong.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Make the Great Outdoors Great Again
customer_reviews.text: I have been pleased with this unit. It was fairly straightforward to assemble and the quality seems good for the price. The hammered bronze finish is nice and durable. The controls work as advertised and it puts out good heat. If it has a weak spot it is the "mushroom" canopy. It comes in 5 pieces that you assemble - you then have to bend them around to get them flat and the canopy overall just feels a little flimsy. It is definitely a good unit for the money, though.
customer_reviews.author: kevinLA

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I can't say how well this works because it didn't come with the hardware to assemble it. After several phone calls and an email, I've been told the hardware will be shipped in "7 to 10 business days, or maybe longer." So, you know, maybe buy a heater you can actually use when it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Heater not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Item advertised as a 48000 BTU heater with a weight bladder installed in the base. The certification labor on the received item indicates it is only a 41000 but rating and no weight bladder came with it.
customer_reviews.author: kelley leigh

customer_reviews.title: well built and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This was an easy to assemble heater, good thing as the directions weren't the best. But the quality of the heater is great and easy to light! Highly recommend this to you guys!
customer_reviews.author: gregg micochero

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy to follow and everything fit together very well. Lighting it is easy and it puts off a lot of heat. We have not used it for more than a few minutes at a after getting out of the pool, so I can't give a good estimate of how long the gas tank will last. This is a great heater give it a shot you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Worst Purchase Ever
customer_reviews.text: Before I even had a chance to use this heater it fell apart. I strongly encourage you to NOT order this patio heater. We had one windy day and the heater toppled over. The top rim broke and the heat part that was attached with screws ripped away from the stand. I never had a chance to use this which is really disappointing. I hope to get my money back, but I doubt it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Doblin

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 Quality.  0% product support.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t expect support. Emailed manufacturer to get help, no response. We bought two of these at the same time. One heater works fine, puts out a lot of heat. The other leaks propane somewhere on the hose to going up.
customer_reviews.author: Tydreda

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a fair price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Really kicks out the heat. Used it on our back porch Thanksgiving day. Had to run on low, it was so effective. Highly recommend this heater!
customer_reviews.author: David Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Great heater. I recommend for cold nights.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly. Easy installation. Great distribution of heat. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri B

customer_reviews.title: Nice patio heater
customer_reviews.text: Nice patio heater. Deflector works great and I like being able to reach in and turn off gas supply without having to lift the tank cover. I could not do that on my last one.
customer_reviews.author: Hillman

customer_reviews.title: Works well. I did not need to hold it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I did not need to hold it in the light position on the dial for more than a few seconds before pushing the ignition button. Much longer and it could be too much gas in the chamber.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware: This patio heater does not come with the propane bottle as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware: This patio heater does not come with the propane bottle as advertised. Seller was completely uncooperative in supplying a propane bottle or issuing a credit in the amount required to purchase a propane bottle. The patio heater itself works well and is good for places that require a small footprint.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Water

customer_reviews.title: it's a great deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Ignition doesn't always work well. Have to adjust the flame height knob just right. Other than that, it's a great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look but they easily fall over and the top is already dented
customer_reviews.author: LysaLysaLysa

customer_reviews.title: The best patio heaters
customer_reviews.text: The best patio heaters, by far. We have purchased several other brands over the years and these patio heaters are better made, give off great heat, easy to turn off and on, look great and are very reasonably priced. We highly recommend this brand of patio heaters!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: It takes the chill away...
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research on these propane heaters, and this unit had the highest BTUs at the lowest price point. It has been a great addition to our patio. Of course it would be nice to heat a larger area, but seriously, if you are outside expectations must be reasonable. It is outside. We had one small issue with the screws not fitting, but had others available in the workbench. Our replacements actually are more sturdy than those provided. Secondly, it isn't completely straight. My "OCD" has a slight issue with that, but I am working through it. Get the cover to protect it during inclement weather and sun damage. Overall, we are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schrank

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, husband had no problems putting together, heats as expected
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Portable heater!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent heater for my shop! Movable and easy to handle! Plenty of heat at a great price! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: SILVERFOX

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was never able to get this heater to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Evans

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this heater for our Fourth of July BBQ..once the sun went down many of us were kept comfortable in the cooler evening air. This heater exceeded my expectations in beauty and warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kris

customer_reviews.title: it's great. However
customer_reviews.text: when it works, it's great. However, there have been persistent issues with the ignition. Now it won't stay lit at all.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and my son and his family love it. They are enjoying more time outdoors even when it is a little chilly. Good product, fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: keeping warm in my open patio
customer_reviews.text: I love it ..a bit difficult to assemble .took two tries to get it right but works great
customer_reviews.author: mafiajoe

customer_reviews.title: This heater is great for keeping you warm
customer_reviews.text: This heater is great for keeping you warm! Haven't had to use it on high as its hot enough on medium. It's a bit flimsy in construction wise...but it's fine for a few nights a year that we use it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Weis

customer_reviews.title: Great Patio Heaters for Cool Nights
customer_reviews.text: These throw off a lot of heat for how small they are. They are very nice looking and the price is great. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim D.

customer_reviews.title: it is a good item and seems to be worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Although the item was delivered to the wrong address, when it was finally received, it took 2 hours to assemble; in the final analysis, it is a good item and seems to be worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jury

customer_reviews.title: It's hot!  Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: No hassle starts every time, which can't be said about all patio heaters. Product came dinged up a little, but no big deal. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany J Cook

customer_reviews.title: Has been working great. Melted the snow that was surrounding my patio
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t that difficult to put together. Has been working great. Melted the snow that was surrounding my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Ryall

customer_reviews.title: Thin steal not very stable
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was like the one I got at Costco. Not even close. Very thin gauge steel could blow over easy and wind compared to the one I got at Costco for 199. Poor poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Got one Christmas 2015. This thing is great. Parts and pieces arrived in good shape. Finish looks great. Assembly was straightforward. The heat is tremendous from this. Much better than the previous propane floor heater we had. I think it's the best heater for the money.
customer_reviews.author: John D Archer

customer_reviews.title: Defective igniter
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking heater and seems mostly well made but the igniter doesn't work. Have to light it manually. Considered returning it but didn't want to have to buy and assemble another one.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Howerton

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to put together with a helper, looks good and fires up immediately. Plan on buying another soon.
customer_reviews.author: J Wansink

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit, assembled easily and quickly (about an hour). I am happy with its look and operation.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made heaters. I bought 4 heaters and all of them were welded poorly to the point the tops fell over. Would not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lots of heat on my 21 by 16 foot deck.
customer_reviews.author: AEG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, heats great. But, it's too big for my deck. Sold it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Spoonamore

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and the instructions were clear and accurate. It does take a couple of extra hands to put together the top deflector
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Wimmer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful finish just could not get burner to stay lit returned for replacement
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly!!! It took a bit to put together but it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well built and easy to assemble. Works great. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. McCans

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: wow heats up and area and the price was great - so far I have not put on full blast . putting together was not fun but easy enough comes with its own tool. I had to shorten top pipe to fit my needs. I recommend not putting in the middle pipe screws if you want to transport in 2 sections - this thing is BIG.
customer_reviews.author: MASTER REVIEWER

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this heater
customer_reviews.text: Easier to put together than other reviews I read. Gives out nice amount of heat. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jocwla

customer_reviews.title: We love it. Vermont evenings cool off quickly and it ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Vermont evenings cool off quickly and it is perfect. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble and worked great with the first flick
customer_reviews.text: Heater was well packaged, easy to assemble and worked great with the first flick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Patio Heater
customer_reviews.text: About the best patio heater you'll find. You'll appreciate the extra heating capability: most pole heaters top out at about 40-41,000 BTU; Xtremepower's produced an impressive 48,000 BTU. It holds only a 20 lb. LP tank and that seems to run out quickly, even set at low. But, after an initial warm-up, you shouldn't need a setting much above low since a great deal of heat is generated even at low setting.
customer_reviews.author: BRSON

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance ordering this for an engagement party we had over Christmas holidays. The date span given for arrival made it look likely it wouldn't make it but we'd still get use out of it so I went ahead and ordered. It arrived before the date span given and after my son put it together it worked beautifully and gave everyone something to huddle around as the night came on. I told several people about how cheap it was and they were quite impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Brady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great keeps you warm big dent in bottom when I recieved
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Heaters
customer_reviews.text: I own 4 of these heaters, I put a tent over my deck for parties and use only 2 heaters and it is toasty. My deck is 18' x 25' lay down a carpet and it's like a living room.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice with great heat. Just not for shorter people.
customer_reviews.author: caroline Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was straight forward although the written instruction is a bit confusing. overall great product and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. We bought two of them and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. We bought two of them and they keep the entire patio warm. The design is better then our previous and are much more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamee Gross

customer_reviews.title: The only problem we had with it is that it ...
customer_reviews.text: The only problem we had with it is that it was listed as being 29" tall in the on-line information and it is obviously taller than that.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Allen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent, but it arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: It's a very decent patio heater, it did arrive with propane tank cover dented and scraped but they quickly sent me replacement so I can't complain at all :-) the customer service was very good. Replacement arrived within a few days and was perfect. I do suggest bolting this thing down to your deck with some long screws if you're putting it on the deck. Otherwise, the wind might knock it over and it will damage the hood. However that is typical with all of these types of heaters. I will be buying two more of these in the springtime to put by the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

product_meta.title: XtremepowerUS 96053 Propane Gas Outdoor Patio Heater Auto Tilt CSA 48,000 BTU Premium Floor Standing, Hammered Bronze
product_meta.description: Color:Hammered BronzeThis multi-purpose heater is ideal for use on your patio, restaurant, pool deck, or for a party, wedding, or any outdoor event (patio heaters are not for use indoors, near combustible materials, or in partially enclosed outdoor areas such as tents)Feature:The heavy-duty patio heater offers an impressive heat output of 48,000 BTUs. Mid-winter merry-making? No problem. Even more, the unit heats a wide area with a range of up to 15 feet in diameter. A nice alternative to a fire pit, the gas patio heater delivers quiet, soothing, consistent heat with no smoke or open flames to worry aboutFor enhanced safety and peace of mind, the heater also features a shut-off tilt valve that turns the heater off automatically if it gets tipped overA wheel assembly with two smooth-rolling wheels comes included, making it easy to transport the outdoor heater from poolside to patio or from one side of the deck to the otherTo operate, all it takes to light the heater is a simple push of the button thanks to its user-friendly, one-step, Piezo ignition systemVariable-heat control knob - allows for low or high heat settings and for turning the heater completely off at the end of the nightSpecifications:Frame Material: SteelHeat Output: 48,000 BTUPower Source: PropaneSafety & Security: Pilot Light, Anti Tip Turn OffHeat Range: 175 Sq/Ft (15' Radius)Diameter of Dome Reflector: 31.9"Fuel Type: PropaneCertification: CSA Certified Propane Tank Included: NoOverall Height: 7.2FTPackage Content:Patio HeaterHose & RegulatorAutomatic Tilt Cut-Off SwitchHardwareManual
feature_bullets: 🔥Patio heater is perfect for the garden, you can use outdoor heater out on the patio at night, or in cold winter, you can see this kind of gas patio heater in the park, coffee table in the street, & you can also use the gas patio when you fishing, drinking with you friends or party. Gas patio heater LP patio heater Patio Heater outdoor heaters

🔥A wheel assembly with two smooth-rolling wheels comes included, making it easy to transport the outdoor heater from poolside to patio or from one side of the deck to the other. No matter what the location or event, friends and family will appreciate the chance to gather and mingle outdoors while wrapped in the wonderful warmth

🔥The heavy-duty patio heater offers an impressive heat output of 48,000 BTUs. Mid-winter merry-making? No problem. Even more, the unit heats a wide area with a range of up to 15 feet in diameter. A nice alternative to a fire pit, the gas patio heater delivers quiet, soothing, consistent heat--with no smoke or open flames to worry about
🔥To operate, all it takes to light the heater is a simple push of the button thanks to its user-friendly, one-step, Piezo ignition system
🔥Variable-heat control knob - Allows for low or high heat settings and for turning the heater completely off at the end of the night

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars116 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
